bFdLi4OuMKU.title: Revolutionize Your Workflow with GPTs: The Future of AI in Business (Video 2 of 6).
bFdLi4OuMKU.author: Traverse AI
bFdLi4OuMKU.description:
This engaging video is the second in a six-part series exploring the transformative impact of GPTs (GPT assistants) on business professionals. Introduced by OpenAI in November 2023, GPTs represent a significant leap in AI technology, offering highly customizable assistance tailored to specific business needs. The video highlights the distinction between general AI tools and GPT assistants, emphasizing the latter's unique efficiency, learning, and adaptability advantages. Key topics include prompt engineering, leveraging AI for tasks like marketing strategy development, and incorporating industry-specific knowledge into GPTs. Through practical examples and scenarios, viewers will learn how these AI tools can be game-changers in various sectors, including law and finance. The video promises to be an invaluable guide for professionals seeking to amplify their productivity and decision-making with AI.

Watch the First Video in this Series on GPTs  -
Future-Proofing Business: The Transformative Power of GPT Assistants [Video 1 of 6] -  https://youtu.be/OZN0hlBkRlU

#chatGPT #GPTs #ai 
.........................
 Join our community of professional AI users and get access to the spreadsheet with my best GPT prompts: https://www.ai4the.win/products/communities/ai4thewin-community

Sing up for our newsletter - https://ai4thewin.beehiiv.com/

Free Advanced Prompt Spreadsheet -https://ai4thewin.beehiiv.com/
...................
Table of Contents:

00:00:00 - Introduction to the Video Series
00:00:06 - GPTs as Game Changers in Business
00:00:13 - Overview of GPTs for Business Professionals
00:00:18 - What Sets GPT Assistants Apart
00:00:27 - The Dream of AI in Business
00:00:47 - Introduction to OpenAI's GPT Assistants
00:01:20 - GPTs vs. General AI Tools
00:02:18 - Customizable GPT Assistants Explained
00:02:42 - The Concept of Prompt Engineering
00:03:00 - Utilizing Prompt Engineering for Business
00:07:05 - Example of Marketing Strategy Development
00:07:54 - How to Engineer Prompts for Specific Tasks
00:09:08 - Uploading Knowledge to GPTs for Specific Industries
00:12:03 - Ten Key Advantages of GPTs
00:12:35 - Efficiency and Information Retention
00:13:28 - Learning and Adaptation Over Time
00:16:09 - Personalization and User Experience
00:19:58 - Invitation to Join the AI Community
00:21:12 - Upcoming Videos on Building GPT Assistants

Enrico Schaefer is a technology attorney representing AI companies.  He is also an AI, ChatGPT, and artificial intelligence implementation expert. Enrico consults with companies (law firms and other organizations) on effectively implementing and developing use policies for their employees. 

Traverse Legal provides services in internet and technology law, corporate law, intellectual property law, business law, trademarks, copyright, trade secrets, and start-up representation.  Traverse attorneys represent various legal issues across AI, blockchain, SaaS, and other tech companies. Visit http://www.traverselegal.com/
